content.text:
Here is my attempt at the task, wrapped in the specified output tags:

<OUTPUT_TEXT>
To support the development of training materials and technical manuals for logistics:

- Collaborate with subject matter experts to gather information on logistics processes, systems, and best practices
- Organize and structure content in a clear, logical flow that will be easy for readers to follow and reference
- Use simple, concise language and define any technical terms and acronyms 
- Incorporate visuals like process flow diagrams, screenshots, and tables to illustrate key concepts
- Develop exercises and knowledge checks to reinforce learning and understanding
- Have content reviewed by logistics SMEs and end users to validate accuracy and usability
- Maintain and update materials over time as logistics processes and systems change
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
